channel.title: Grabcartoons on zzamboni.org

item.title: Grabcartoons v2.7
item.description: Last night I made a new release of my comic aggregator script, grabcartoons. You can fetch it from it brand new web page, now hosted by github.com instead of sourceforge.net.
